title: The Best Continental Short Stories of [the Year], and the Yearbook of the Continental Short Story
additional-note: The title varied from year to year.  This serial includes reprints of stories originally published in other venues outside the United States. While we know of no contribution renewals that specifically mention this collection, we have not checked for renewals that cover the stories as originally published, nor have we determined whether unrenewed stories were eligible for GATT copyright restoration.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Scott F Andrews for copyright research on this title.
